HediffDef.label: Race: Hobgoblin
HediffDef.description:
Hobgoblins, despite their clearly goblinoid appearance, are practically equal to humans aside from the goblinoid trait of having low psychic sensitivity.
- 50% Psychic Senstivity

Ascension:
 Can be ascended into an Orc by an Orc. Ascension requires the races experience bar be filled first, which can be done by having them perform tasks they have a passion in.
